sources.title: 1950 Film Noir - Borderline | Two Undercover Agents Unwittingly Stalk the Same Target.
sources.description:
Two undercover agents infiltrate a drug-smuggling ring in Mexico, thee find them selves falling in love with each other. Neither is aware of the other's identity As they decide to make a run for the border.

Directed by William A. Seiter
Written by Devery Freeman

CAST:
Fred MacMurray: Johnny McEvoy, posing as Johnny Macklin
Claire Trevor: Madeleine Haley, posing as Gladys LaRue
Raymond Burr: Pete Ritchie
Jose Torvay: Miguel
Morris Ankrum: Bill Whittaker
Roy Roberts: Harvey Gumbin
Don Diamond: Deusik
Nacho Galindo: Porfirio
Pepe Hern: Pablo
Grazia Narciso: Porfirio's Wife
Clifton Young: Suspect questioned by Whittaker
Charles Lane: Peterson, customs officer
Johnny Indrisano: Gumbin's henchman
Chrispin Martin: Pepi, hotel clerk

American crime film noir

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/berap5kt-go

@CultCinemaClassics

sources.title: 1944 Film noir - Dangerous Passage - Melodrama on the high seas!
sources.description:
Joe Beck learns his grandfather left him $200,000 and heads to Galveston, Texas to claim it, but after being assaulted, he boards a ship to escape. Onboard with Nita, who is also fleeing, Beck faces threats, a near-fatal accident, and uncovers schemes to steal his inheritance and hide the crew's illicit activities.

Director: William Berke
Writers: Daniel Mainwaring 

Main cast:
Robert Lowery - Joe Beck
Phyllis Brooks - Nita Paxton
Charles Arnt - Daniel Bergstrom
Jack La Rue - Mike Zomano
John Eldredge - Vaughn
Victor Kilian - Buck Harris, 1st Mate
Alec Craig - Dawson the Steward
William Edmunds - Captain Saul

Genres: Drama, Film Noir
Release date: December 18, 1944
Filming location: California

B&W version: https://youtu.be/ft58sfmanqY

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Private detective Sam Ruben's clever plan falls apart with the onset of amnesia. Everyone is trying to kill him and he doesn't know why. The classic film noir milieu now comes to you in the form of an animated feature.
metadata.Actors: Mark Keller, Bettina Devin, Roger Jackson
